title: Piramal Capital and Housing Finance integrates over 3,000 employees of DHFL - Economic Times
content: Piramal Capital and Housing Finance integrates over 3,000 employees of DHFL  Economic Times
description: The company, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Piramal Enterprises Limited, continues to hire extensively for retail operations pan-India and has rolled out 2,000 offers already in the last three months in the merged entity.
